post:
New nodes in Boston Mass ready to go. Nodes are configured with dual Xeon E5430 processors, 16GB of RAM and 15K SAS Drives in raid 10.  Each node is connected at 1 Gbps to a 10Gbps pure cogent uplink(for the moment). Amazing speeds along the east coast, to Europe and Canada. High quality brocade network. 7 Day money back guarantee.
